infotexts.afflictiondescription.Reiki_Side_Effect_: Caused by the body's active defense, this rejection makes the Reiki within you chaotic (Treat with Reiki Stabilizer).
The condition worsens, and you feel stabbing pains from within (Treat with Reiki Stabilizer).
infotexts.afflictionname.Reiki_Pressure: Reiki Pressure (Treat with physical damage medicine)
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Reiki_Pressure: Hostile Reiki rampages through your body (Treat with physical damage medicine such as Morphine, Fentanyl, Panacea, Plant Essential Oil, Europa Infusion, Gilead Balm, etc.)
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Essential_Oil_Appl: The injury site has eased, but the pain lingers.
Special essential oils coat the wounded area, helping the injury recover.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Potion_In_Effect: This fills you with confidence (reduces attack damage).
infotexts.afflictionname.Phoenix_Burn: Phoenix Burn (Treat with Plant Essential Oil or Europa Infusion)
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Phoenix_Burn: Scars left by a special flame always give the illusion of being non-lethal (Treat with Plant Essential Oil, Europa Infusion, or wait for natural fading).
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Aura_Strip: After part of your aura is stripped away, you feel an unexplained decline in physical condition.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Resurrection: Just an everyday occurrence, painless and uneventful.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Water_Heart: Your heart is as calm as still water.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Lost_Dream: You realize your past dreams are gradually fading away, and your physical condition declines with them.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Elements_De: A dark current surges within your body.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Elements_Bu: A healing energy flows within your body.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Budesonide_: The airway inflammation is easing, and asthma symptoms are being relieved.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_MEID_Effect: Your physical abilities have been enhanced.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Royal_Flare: An overwhelming heat courses through you, threatening to tear your body apart.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Silent_Sele: Your body feels frozen, movements no longer agile.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Magic_Destruction: Your internal magic is nearly destroyed, preventing normal activity until healed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Rib_Injury: It seems a portion of your rib is missing.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Reiki_Stabi: The intense internal pain has slightly lessened.
The intense internal pain has eased.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Magic_Boost: Your magic is more active, easily manipulated at will.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sleepless_Nightmar: A nightmare not of this world disturbs your mind, lowering your resistance.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Ancient_Sorrow_Ter: Deep negative emotions unsettle your spirit.
infotexts.afflictionname.Expellees_Canaan_Small: Mountain Hollow: “Promised Land of the Banished”
infotexts.afflictionname.Expellees_Canaan_Huge: Mountain Hollow: “Promised Land of the Banished”
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Expellees_Canaan: A technique to drive away intruders. Makes the small appear mighty. Truly worthy of Momiji! Please continue to guard us faithfully.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Bite: Though no wound is visible, the pain at the site will not fade.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Rippling_Ef: Supernatural ripples make your body uncontrollable and your mind dazed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Medical_Eff: You suddenly forget vital knowledge, especially in medicine and magic.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Scarlet_Long_Night: Words spoken unintentionally may change the fate of those around you.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Aya_Camera_: As if frozen before a camera’s gaze, you are unable to move.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Destruction_Of_Mu: Everything has a vital “eye.” To destroy it, simply apply force and it will break with ease.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Freeze_Low: Frostbite hurts slightly but isn’t severe (Treat like burns).
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Freeze_High: The frostbite is severe and won’t heal on its own—treat promptly (Treat like burns).
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Yousei_Powe: A latent anomaly is brewing within you.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Nitori_Backpack_Ta: Slightly increases bleed resistance, slightly reduces debuff duration, slightly extends buff duration, reduces friendly fire, and decreases weapon spread.
Slightly increases stun and Reiki disorder resistance, heals infected wounds and Reiki disorder, reduces friendly fire, increases movement speed, and boosts skill level.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Lunatic_Lun: A surge of madness arises, increasing hostility toward teammates.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Pendulum_Ma: Pendulum magic enriches your magical ability. Magic ability above 120 grants +5% bleed resistance.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Tide_Bolt_E: The mysterious ocean of the moon surges within, weakening your defenses.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Alice_Magic: Flames from the magical kingdom burn your skin while breaking down your defenses.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Gensokyo_Divinggea: Increases physical resistance and skill level.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Boudary_Divinggear: Increases physical resistance and skill level.
infotexts.afflictionname.Touhou_Lunar_Orbit_Effect: Lunar Cyclone (Treat with physical damage medicine)
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Lunar_Orbit: The chaotic lunar cyclone damages the skin and may worsen if untreated.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Mana_Release_Effec: Continuously releases inner magic to resist water pressure.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Luna_Clock_: Forcibly manipulating time heavily strains your body, lowering resistance.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Miracles_Wi: Magic from the Wind Priestess protects and slowly heals you.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.SanaeTalent_Effect: +50% repair and hull repair speed, +15% stun resistance.
+10% max health, +20% leg physical damage resistance.
Gain 7 random skill points, +15% experience gain speed.
+15% movement speed, +10% attack speed, -20% friendly fire damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Treatment_G: A surge of healing energy miraculously treats your wounds.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Sparkfire_S: Flaming rounds stick to you, burning intensely.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Deceit_Mod_: Your next melee and ranged attacks (chance) will mark the target.
You have been marked by a dangerous target.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Maple_Leaf_: The Maple Leaf Revolver’s performance has greatly increased.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Dichromatic: Increases physical resistance and resists/recovers negative states.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Durationinc: Further extends buff duration and shortens debuff duration.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Huskinfecti: Grants extra burn resistance and increases movement speed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Paralysisre: Improves skill level and boosts experience gain speed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_ODM6_Poison: Foul magical toxins severely weaken your body. The sticky air greatly diminishes your strength. -75% ranged damage, +25% movement speed, +60% melee damage, -50% friendly fire damage, reduced physical resistance. Health temporarily +25 until the toxin fully spreads, after which severe consequences occur.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Cuisine_Eff: Being well-fed comforts you and improves your spirit, preventing nightmares. Increases resistance to Endless Nightmare and cures mental illness.
Total comfort. Increases debuff resistance and buff duration.
Wonderful taste melts on your tongue, invigorating you. Increases skill level and max health.
The flavor lingers long, making you feel healthier. Increases movement speed and attack damage.
Your mind and body reach peak condition. Grants extra health and allows full-speed creature dragging.
The finest cuisine brings the finest joy. Extends buff duration and boosts melee damage and attack speed.
The finest cuisine brings the finest joy. Extends buff duration and increases repair speed, hull repair speed, skill gain speed, and underwater propulsion speed.
The finest cuisine brings the finest joy. Extends buff duration, increases swim speed and water current resistance, and grants immunity to hypoxia and water pressure.
The finest cuisine brings the finest joy. Grants immunity to control reversal (stun), and increases skill level and attack damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Drinks_Effe: A sip of clarity. You gain mental resistance faster.
Excellent wine! Your buff duration lasts longer.
You crave another! Your stun resistance improves.
An unforgettable taste! Grants immunity to control reversal (stun) and increases melee damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Rose_Fragra: The sweet scent uplifts you, enhancing physical abilities.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Sentient_Gr: More likely to become the target of enemy attacks.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_ODM8_Aff_Ev: Unbearable stabs pierce your heart, greatly reducing vitality but triggering latent potential. -50% max health, slightly less effective medicine and healing, but greatly increased attack damage, faster movement, and higher skill levels.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_ODM9_Curse_: Fear spreads within you, lowering physical resistance but awakening latent power.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Locked_Flan: A warm teddy bear brings you comfort.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDest: Poisonous gas seeps into your nose, temporarily weakening your resistance and body.
Corrosive gas touches your skin, causing temporary bodily damage.
A special trap temporarily hinders your movement.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Lunatic_Mis: The mission is arduous, but someone from Gensokyo guards you. Greatly increases resistance to debuffs, stun, and Reiki pressure.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_ODM11_Aff_E: A sudden, inexplicable urge floods your body. +40% ranged spread, +30% explosion damage, +30% explosion radius, -20% friendly fire damage, grants burn resistance, and immunity to stun.
There should be no rain in the deep sea… so where is it coming from? Reduces ranged attack speed and accuracy, increases burn resistance.
Thunder in the deep sea? Yet its roar echoes in your ears. Increases attack speed.
There should be no hurricanes underwater… yet the storm pushes you forward. Intermittently reduces movement speed, then increases it.
Fog pervades the deep sea, limiting visibility.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Blood_Crown: -50% physical damage resistance, +100% friendly fire damage, +100% buff duration, +20% all damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_ODM10_Aff_E: -30% physical damage resistance, +50% friendly fire damage, reduced explosion damage and range.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Hyouibana_A: Power from a forgotten place fills you, rewriting the Magatama effects: Serene Magatama: Provides illumination and +50% water current resistance. Sturdy Magatama: -15% ranged spread, +10% melee attack speed. Soft Magatama: +30% poison, paralysis, and infected wound resistance; allows full-speed creature dragging. Warm Magatama: +20% burn resistance. Boiling Magatama: +25% melee damage, +10% projectile damage. Cold Magatama: +20 max health, +50% hypoxia resistance after losing consciousness. White Magatama: +20% stun resistance; each hit grants vitality up to 300/600. Black Magatama: +10% skill level, +10% physical and burn resistance. Smooth Magatama: Full water pressure protection, +20% underwater propulsion speed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Moriya_Bag_: The divine blessing of the Moriya Shrine—who is your faith for?
+10% skill level, +10 max health, -5% debuff duration.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Errata_Lant: Increases movement speed by 15% and grants +15 bonus health.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Reiki_Pressur: You died from excessive reiki pressure, causing your body to collapse.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Phoenix_Burn: You died from the continuous burning of the Phoenix, turning to ashes.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Touhou_Bite: You died from severe biting, consumed completely.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Destruction_O: You died from the complete destruction of your Mu, dying from the root.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Reiki_Side_Ef: You died from the pollution and erosion of your reiki, collapsing from the inside out.
Your reiki within has been polluted and eroded, collapsing from the inside out.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Touhou_Freeze: Your breathing has completely stopped, frozen into a statue.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Hyouibana_Effect_P: Attack damage +10%.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect; Aya’s token remains effective.
Melee damage +30%.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon and equipment effects.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect; MEID and Magic Veil bonuses remain active.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect; Heaven Peach effects remain active.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect; Aya’s token remains effective.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect; max health +10%.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect; max health +10%.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect; melee damage +20%.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect; debuff resistance +10%.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect; max health +10%.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect; stun resistance +10%.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect.
Attack damage +10%.
Skill level +15%.
Grants this character’s exclusive weapon effect.
